name: FRigVMFunction_VerletIntegrateVector
doc:
Simulates a single position over time using Verlet integration. It is recommended to use SpringInterp instead as it
is more accurate and stable, and has more meaningful parameters.

Strength: The strength of the verlet spring
Damp: The amount of damping to apply ( 0.0 to 1.0, but usually really low like 0.005 )
Blend: The amount of blending to apply per second
Force: The force feeding into the solver. Can be used for gravity.
